data.title: Richard Rodgers Theatre
data.meta_description: Hamilton on 1 May 2024 at Richard Rodgers Theatre in New York, New York. Tickets available. Click here to find out more.
data.meta_site_name: Richard Rodgers Theatre | Latest Events, Information & Tickets. Independent Theater Guide. Not a box office or venue.
data.text:
If planning on coming to New York, New York on Wednesday 1st May 2024 then you have to come out to the iconic Richard Rodgers Theatre to see the greatest Musical of 2024, Hamilton! This is the event that people literally cannot stop talking about, and it’s not all just hype. The buzz is REAL! This is the Musical that received 11 Tony Awards! Fans will have their chance to experience the passion, energy, and unrivalled talent, LIVE! Hamilton features some of the hottest stars on Broadway, and is an absolute can’t miss show. So if you’re anywhere near New York ON Wednesday 1st May 2024, then don’t miss out and come see Hamilton live. Click the Buy Tickets button below to get your seats today!

Come on down to Richard Rodgers Theatre on the Wednesday 1st May 2024 in New York for a trip back to 1776, New York City, American founding father Alexander Hamilton, a man who ran his mouth and wound-up dead! Hamilton reminds us that our history was not preordained by some outside force or even by almighty founding fathers but eked out by the daily, uncertain decisions of flawed, selfish human beings. Lyrics like “How lucky we are to be alive right now! History is happening in Manhattan, and we just happen to be in the greatest city in the world!” This is a fast-paced, lyrical line, lyrical rhyme frantically thrown at you amid spectacular set pieces in the middle of incredibly intricate multi group choreographed moves, with each set change effortlessly blending into the next keeping up a uncompromising tempo through-out the entire performance. So, come on down and raise a glass to American freedom, and listen to this intense story of American history told to you by the all singing, all dancing crew of Hamilton. You do not want to miss your shot, come and buy your tickets now to the great all-American story right now.
